data.event: The manor was anciently in the Bruns, Lords of Bowness, who were patrons also of the church: before the year 1380 it became the property of the Dacres, and was annexed to the Barony of Burgh, belonging to the Earl of Lonsdale.

event.title: was augmented by Queen Anne's Bounty in 1772

data.event: This small rectory was augmented by Queen Anne's Bounty in 1772.
